disclaimer.credits: Here will be a few words about the creators, used technologies and licence

giphy.disclaimer: Giphy does not sponsor or support this project by any means. All gifs in the message panel is from Giphy.
giphy.soon: Gifs by Giphy, soon available in chat.

repo.backend: The frontend wouldn't be possible without their backend
repo.frontend: The original repository is available on the link below:

chat.max-attachment-reached: You cannot send more than {maxcount} attachment in a single message, the rest {leftover} files will be ignored.

numeric.out_of_bounds: The given number is out of bounds! Is shall be between {min} and {max}.

guild.delete-confirm:
Are you really going to delete {name} ({id})?
This step is irreversible!

render_attachments.name: Render attachments
render_attachments.description:
Specifies whether the client should render texts and images or handle all attachments as plain files.
 This setting does not effect gifs or interactive links.

autoplay_gifs.name: Gif autoplay
autoplay_gifs.description: Tells the client whether gifs should go infinitelly on screen, or only on mouse hover and short tap on mobile

layout.name: Client layouts
layout.description: Button size, paddings and margins can be specified this way.

normal.name: Normal
normal.description: Default spacing. Every layout is based on this preset.

compact.name: Compact
compact.description: Buttons will appear smaller, objects and labels will be closer to each other.

comfy.name: Spacious
comfy.description: Buttons will be more accessible, everything will have a generous amount of padding.

message_grouping_timeout.name: Message grouping period
message_grouping_timeout.description:
The time interval in which consecuitive messages from the same person is considered semantically related.
Informations such as the sender's profile and the timestamp is only shown on the first message in one group.

locale.name: UI language
locale.description:
Sets the client's language.
This setting only affects the application's language.
If the specified language is not supported on the application, it will fall back to the default, which is english (en_US) at all times.

font_size.name: Font size
font_size.description: Sets the font size of the application.
